org.openscience.cdk.renderer.generators
Class BasicBondGenerator

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.renderer.generators.BasicBondGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGenerator<IAtomContainer>
Direct Known Subclasses:
RingGenerator
@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.renderer.generators.BasicBondGeneratorTest")
public class BasicBondGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
implements IGenerator<IAtomContainer>

Generator for elements from bonds. Only two-atom bonds are supported by this generator.

Belongs to CDK module:
renderbasic
Source code:
cdk-1.4.x

getWidthForBond

                              RendererModel model)
Determine the width of a bond, returning either the width defined in the model, or the override width. Note that this will be scaled to the space of the model.

Parameters:

generateBondElement

public IRenderingElement generateBondElement(IBond bond,
                                             IBond.Order type,
                                             RendererModel model)
Generate a LineElement or an ElementGroup of LineElements for this bond. This version should be used if you want to override the type - for example, for ring double bonds.

Parameters:
bond - the bond to generate for
type - the type of the bond - single, double, etc
model - the renderer model
Returns:
one or more rendering elements
